name: Controller Menu for temporary voice channels
description:
This is the controller for the temporary voice chats.
You can click the following buttons to perform the specified action.
error-message: Could not send message to temporary voice channel.

limit.name: Set Channel Limit
limit.description: Set user limit for your voice channel.

bitrate.name: Set Channel Bitrate
bitrate.description: Adjust the bitrate for your voice channel.

nsfw.name: Toggle NSFW
nsfw.description: Mark your voice channel as NSFW/SFW.

status.name: Set Channel Status
status.description: Set the status of your voice channel.

kick.name: Kick a User
kick.description: Kick a user from your voice channel.

ban.name: Ban a User
ban.description: Ban a user from your voice channel.

invite.name: Invite a User
invite.description: Invite a user to your voice channel.

clear.name: Clear 100 Channel Messages
clear.description: Clear the chat in your voice channel.

public.name: Set Channel Public
public.description: Set your voice channel to public.

private.name: Set Channel Private
private.description: Set your voice channel to private.
